featured.text: In addition, the leftover material following the removal of fibers can even be used as a natural fertilizer back in the pineapple fields.
Individuals can also speak to local hair stylists and pet groomers about sending in leftover hair and fur. 21.

definition.zh_def: 剩餘物，特別是食物或其他物品在使用後留下的部分。
definition.en_def: Something that remains after the main part has been used or dealt with, especially food.
definition.example: We had pizza for dinner, and there are some leftovers for lunch tomorrow.
